meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>foot</radical> heard an <radical>omen</radical> and now it's making you <kanji>hop</kanji> over things.
readingMnemonic: As you hop you start to hear an awful scream coming down the street. It's Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう) and she's running straight for you yelling, "STEP ON MY STREET'S CRACKS! STOP HOPPING OR YOUR MOTHER WILL NEVER BREAK HER BACK!"
